akn:section.akn:heading: Supervision and enforcement with respect to Federal qualified payment stablecoin issuers and subsidi

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Rule of construction Nothing in this chapter may be construed to modify or otherwise affect any right or remedy under any Federal consumer financial law, including 12 U.S.C. 5515 and 15 U.S.C. 41 et seq.
